 2002-20552002-12-030HERITAGE,  ,  ,  , 
ActMuseums Act
PrecisApproval of the appointment by the Minister of Canadian Heritage of DONALD RAE SOBEY of Trenton, Nova Scotia, as Chairperson of the Board of Trustees of the National Gallery of Canada to hold office during pleasure for a term ending November 18, 2005.
